name: Dark Light Shine
description:
Dark Light Shine - Created for Ludum Dare 35 : Shapeshift (compo)

DLS is a fast paced geometric rail shooter/bullet hell hybrid where your ship and it's abilities are constantly shifting as you combat your enemies.

Instructions:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Shoot primary weapon
Left Shift - Activate ability (when off cooldown)
P - Bring up menu (in game)

Every enemy that you kill gives you a sigil. Once you have 3 sigils, your ship will shapeshift, giving you new attacks and abilities, as well as restoring your health.
